meta.title: Kohelet | Digital Design & Development Studio
meta.description: We build websites, apps, and digital experiences that drive results. Custom development, stunning design, and strategy that works.
meta.keywords: web development, app design, UI UX, artificial intelligence, SEO, digital studio

hero.headline: Building Your Digital Future Together
hero.subheadline: We assemble all the pieces - design, development, strategy, and cutting-edge technology - into a digital product that works for you and delivers real results.

services.section_subtitle: Everything you need to succeed digitally, under one roof

items.title: Web Development
items.description: Fast, modern websites optimized for every device. Built with cutting-edge technologies like Next.js and React.

items.title: App Development
items.description: iPhone and Android apps that users love. Smooth experience, excellent performance, and quality code.

items.title: UI/UX Design
items.description: Design that speaks to your customers. Beautiful, intuitive interfaces that turn visitors into clients.

items.title: AI Integration
items.description: Smart integration of artificial intelligence into your products. Chatbots, automations, and custom solutions.

items.title: SEO & Growth
items.description: We'll make sure they find you. Organic promotion, search engine optimization, and results that speak for themselves.

items.title: Digital Strategy
items.description: Proper planning is half the journey. We'll build a plan together that fits your business and your goals perfectly.

process.section_subtitle: A simple, transparent process from idea to launch

steps.title: Discovery Call
steps.description: We'll get to know your business, understand your needs and goals, and see how we can help. No commitment, just a good conversation.

steps.title: Planning & Design
steps.description: We'll build the perfect plan together. Design, present, get feedback, and improve - until you're completely satisfied.

steps.title: Development & Launch
steps.description: We'll turn the design into reality. Quality development, comprehensive testing, and smooth launch. And we're here afterwards too.

about.headline: Kohelet - Assembling Your Digital Puzzle
about.description: We're a team of designers, developers, and strategists who love what they do. Our name - Kohelet - comes from the Hebrew word 'to assemble', to gather and connect. And that's exactly what we do: we assemble all the pieces - technology, design, and strategy - into a complete, winning digital product.

values.title: True Partnership
values.description: We're not vendors, we're partners. We accompany you every step of the way.

values.title: Uncompromising Quality
values.description: Every pixel, every line of code - with attention to the smallest details.

values.title: Measurable Results
values.description: Beautiful is important, but business results are what really matters.

values.title: Full Transparency
values.description: You'll always know what's happening. No surprises, no hidden costs.

row1.name: Sarah Cohen
row1.quote: Kohelet took minutes to understand our vision and saved weeks of back-and-forth. The DX is top-tier.

row1.name: Michael Levy
row1.quote: We shipped our website revamp 3× faster. The defaults are sensible and secure out of the box.

row1.name: Michelle Abraham
row1.quote: The platform feels invisible—just fast, reliable delivery and clean reporting.

row1.name: David Rosen
row1.quote: Quality baked in. We finally trust our digital presence for decision-making.

row2.name: Noa Shapiro
row2.quote: The design process trimmed our timelines by half. The UI stays out of the way and just works.

row2.name: Yoni Katz
row2.quote: SEO optimization, analytics, and performance tracking—without extra integration work. Huge win.

row2.name: Tali Ben-David
row2.quote: From concept to production with one team. Best onboarding we've had in years.

row2.name: Oren Gold
row2.quote: Clean process, helpful communication, and thoughtful solutions. It's the small things.

cta_section.headline: Ready to Start?
cta_section.subheadline: Tell us about your project and we'll get back to you within 24 hours with ideas and a proposal

contact.section_subtitle: Leave your details and we'll get back to you soon

message.label: Tell Us About Your Project
message.placeholder: What are you looking for? A new website? An app? Improving something existing?

submit.label: Send
